name: Pauline Dauvin
thematic_priorities: Commissioner-specific: Premium factual with family-friendly appeal and strong production values
Premium factual content with family-friendly appeal
Sports documentaries featuring inspirational athletes or teams
Nature and wildlife programming with family appeal
Limited interest in political or controversial subjects

additional_info.commissioning_cycles: Ongoing; submissions accepted year-round unless strand-specific

additional_info.independent_production: Open to pitches from independent producers/companies
